column2: AT&T; helped U.S. NSA in spying on Internet traffic -N.Y. Times WASHINGTON
column3: Aug 15 Telecommunications powerhouse AT&T; Inc has provided extensive assistance to the U.S. National Security Agency as the spy agency conducts surveillance on huge volumes of Internet traffic passing through the United States
